item.title: Complaints about crashing 13th, 14th Gen Intel CPUs now have data to back them up - The Verge
item.description:
1. Complaints about crashing 13th, 14th Gen Intel CPUs now have data to back them up  The Verge
  2. Dino survival game developer is switching all its servers to AMD 'which experience 100 times fewer crashes compared to Intel' because it's 'only a matter of time before affected CPUs fail'  PC Gamer
  3. Warframe devs report 80% of game crashes happen on Intel's overclockable Core i9 chips — Core i7 K-series CPUs also have high crash rates  Tom's Hardware
  4. Game dev accuses Intel of selling ‘defective’ Raptor Lake CPUs  The Register
  5. Too Many Crashes? Game Developer Accuses Intel of Selling Defective CPUs  PCMag
